âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Converts Markdown to PDF using markdown-pdf â€¢ Converts images to PDF using img2pdf
ðŸ“– Summary: PdfItDown is a Python package designed to convert various file formats, including Markdown, PowerPoint, Word, Excel, HTML, text-based formats (CSV, XML, JSON), ZIP files, and image files (PNG, JPG), into PDF documents. It leverages libraries like markitdown, markdown-pdf, img2pdf, and LlamaIndex to achieve format-specific conversions, offering both a command-line interface and a Python API for flexible usage.
